name: Green One!
tagline: The latest repository for the Green One game
body:
### Welcome to Green One.

<t>As of June 29, 2015, the game can be played [here (hosted at Joel's previous student website)](http://students.washington.edu/joelhun/)

<t>Green One is an HTML5/JavaScript-based side-scroller built in 9 weeks by Joel Hunsaker, Aaron Schraufnagel, and Kyle Sessions, with help from Marilyn Ferguson. It was built lovingly to provide a challenge and not be beaten the first time through. It was made easier to demonstrate full playability.

<t>Make your way across multiple worlds, using your gravity switch and laser cannon to get to the other side of the planet.
<t>Green One incorporates the Phaser.io framework, with a combination of HTML5/CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and JSON.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
